content.p: Your free programme of study skills support from University of Nottingham Libraries. Explore a wide range of resources, tools and webinars to help you develop your academic, information and digital skills and feel confident in your studies. See all sessions Discover study strategies that work for you Explore how to search effectively to find information Approaches to reading and evaluating information Learn how to reference accurately, and why this is an essential skill Develop your writing skills, from criticality and argument to reflection Prepare for assessments and understand your feedback Support from Libraries, Wellbeing, CELE and more (UK, China and Malaysia) Moodle NUsearch Digital Student On Course for your Masters Kings Meadow Campus Lenton Lane Nottingham, NG7 2NR telephone: +44 (0) 115 951 5151 fax: +44 (0) 115 951 3666 Contact us
